thread.title: Gender Discrimination at Uber Is a Reminder of How Hard Women Have to Fight to Be Believed
thread.title_full: Gender Discrimination at Uber Is a Reminder of How Hard Women Have to Fight to Be Believed

author: Madison Malone Kircher
title: Gender Discrimination at Uber Is a Reminder of How Hard Women Have to Fight to Be Believed
text: Susan Fowler worked as an engineer at Uber for a year — a “ very, very strange year ” — which began with her being sexually propositioned by a manager via the company’s chat platform and ended with her quitting after she was told she could be fired (illegally) for... More »
